Package org.pepstock.charba.client.ml

Class MLHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.ml.MLHelper
  • public final class MLHelper
extends Object
    Utility entry point to create ML objects.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LinearRegression createLinearRegression​(List<Double> y)
      Creates a simple linear regression, using the passed Y values.
      X values are creating starting from 0 with increment of 1.
      LinearRegression createLinearRegression​(List<Double> y, double starting)
      Creates a simple linear regression, using the passed Y values.
      X values are creating starting from passed argument with increment of 1.
      LinearRegression createLinearRegression​(List<Double> y, double starting, double increment)
      Creates a simple linear regression, using the passed Y values.
      X values are creating starting from passed argument with increment of passed argument.
      LinearRegression createLinearRegression​(List<Double> x, List<Double> y)
      Creates a simple linear regression, using the passed X and Y values.

      Creates a simple linear regression, using the passed DataPoints.

      Creates a simple linear regression, using the passed X and Y values.

      Creates a simple linear regression, using the passed TimeSeriesItems.
      RegressionDataset createLinearRegressionDataset​(List<Double> y)
      Creates a regression dataset, to add to a chart, using the passed Y values.
      X values are creating starting from 0 with increment of 1.

      • createLinearRegression

        public LinearRegression createLinearRegression​(List<Double> y)
        Creates a simple linear regression, using the passed Y values.
        X values are creating starting from 0 with increment of 1.
        Parameters:
        y - Y values to use to create the regression
        Returns:
        simple linear regression instance

      • createLinearRegression

        public LinearRegression createLinearRegression​(List<Double> y,
                                               double starting)
        Creates a simple linear regression, using the passed Y values.
        X values are creating starting from passed argument with increment of 1.
        Parameters:
        y - Y values to use to create the regression
        starting - starting value to create X values
        Returns:
        simple linear regression instance

      • createLinearRegression

        public LinearRegression createLinearRegression​(List<Double> y,
                                               double starting,
                                               double increment)
        Creates a simple linear regression, using the passed Y values.
        X values are creating starting from passed argument with increment of passed argument.
        Parameters:
        y - Y values to use to create the regression
        starting - starting value to create X values
        increment - increment to apply to the starting value
        Returns:
        simple linear regression instance

      • createLinearRegression

        Creates a simple linear regression, using the passed X and Y values.
